name: Majorem
description:
Majorem is a peaceful, resource gathering village builder that sees players cater and care for their community. 

After the previous mayor runs away, leaving the village in tatters, you take over the role of mayor. You will need to gather resources in order to build infrastructure to grow crops, cook food and craft better materials.

Some things to remember: 

  • Make sure to keep your villagers happy and fed!
  • Don't mind the villagers doing some crazy things (they like to do what they want)
  • Have fun!

Created by Tranzfuser 2021 team "Cosy Umbrella"
